trans-unit.source: Sets the default value of a parameter when called from a language that supports default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 設定從支援預設參數的語言呼叫參數時，該參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> attribute allows you to specify a default parameter value in a language that does not otherwise support default parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>屬性可讓您指定的語言，否則不支援預設參數的預設參數值。

trans-unit.source: After you apply this attribute to your code, languages that support default parameters can use the specified value as a default parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您將此屬性套用至您的程式碼之後，支援預設參數的語言可以使用指定的值做為預設參數。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> does not add support for default parameters to languages that do not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>不會在不支援這項功能的語言新增支援預設參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> with a method written in C#, which does not support default parameters, you cannot use the default parameter when calling the method from C#.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>方法，以 C# 撰寫，但不支援預設參數，無法使用預設參數，當從 C# 呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the default parameter only when calling the method in a language such as C++ that does support the feature.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫方法的 c + + 等語言中支援此功能，您可以使用預設參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> is particularly useful to specify default parameters for methods of a COM interop interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>以指定的 COM interop 介面之方法的預設參數特別有用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> attribute to a parameter of a method written in C#.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>屬性設定為以 C# 撰寫方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the default value of a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute" /> class with the default value of a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用參數的預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> attribute to a parameter written in a language such as Microsoft Visual C# that does not support default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來套用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>屬性設定為參數，例如 Microsoft Visual C# 不支援預設參數的語言撰寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute> attribute to a parameter of a method written in C#.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultParameterValueAttribute>屬性設定為以 C# 撰寫方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value of a parameter.
An object that represents the default value of a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示參數的預設值。
